summary: About 9,000 veterans a day receive nursing home care in 134 VA community living centers. We reviewed the data VA has on COVID-19 cases and deaths at these facilities. Since November 2020, the 5 highest case rates at these facilities ranged from 38% to 59% of residents. The 5 highest death rates ranged from 6% to 11% of residents. The VA has been compiling and...
title: VA Health Care: Additional Data Needed to Inform the COVID- 19 Response in Community Living Centers
